name: Your little story: Winter
description:
The main character was preparing for the celebration of the New Year. Dressing up a Christmas tree, he accidentally fell and lost consciousness. Waking up, the main character saw the spirit and the fact that all the toys were broken. Spirit offers to help the main character. Accept or Refuse?

- Choice of romantic interest: a cute and cheerful girl or a cold and detached guy
- 10 colorful CG, beautiful backgrounds
- Easy story that brightens up your evening
